name: Rubber-tyred series Mobile Crusher
overview: According to customers’ requirements of improving crushing plants mobility, SBM developed Rubber-tyred series Mobile Crusher. It contains many types models, such as mobile jaw crushing plant, mobile impact crushing plant and mobile cone crushing plant, etc.
feature: Meet high demands for mobility both on site and on the road
Easy to combine with other plants
application: Rubber-tyred series Mobile Crushers are used in great many fields that have great requirements of plants’ mobility, such as river aggregates processing, construction waste recycling, road &bridge construction and mining industries and so on.
